pullrequest.title: Add function for removing user from db

content.raw:
This logic is interesting (removing the resource when unsharing the last user). However, if you simply try to unshare the resource, the behavior is going to be different. So this logic should be moved to the "revoke", to remove the differences in behavior.

This could also raise other concerns, because certain  resources that cannot be removed at all (like the initial resources). Of course, those resources are not useful when shared with nobody. There is a concept of creator for a resource, that may be better for this purpose.

In any case, this should not be a concern for this PR.
